channel.title: Help with testscape commands
channel.description: when i add a command in testscape, it dosent work. i know where to add it(under:"/end of frame testing/". but i doesnt work can someone help me

item.title: Help with testscape commands
item.dc:creator: @foz foz
item.description:
@foz wrote:

[quote=“baldwinc47, post:3, topic:77086”][code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“COMMAND”)

{
sendMessage(“Test Command WATCH OUT YOU GOT A PHAT”);
addItem(1048, 1);
}[/code]

You can edit this and add it with this:

Find “phats”

under the last “}”
add your command[/quote]

In a more understandable form,

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“COMMANDNAME”)

{
sendMessage(“TEXTHERE ( you can remove this line )”);
addItem(ITEMID, AMMOUNT);
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with testscape commands
item.dc:creator: @baldwinc47 baldwinc47
item.description:
@baldwinc47 wrote:

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“COMMAND”)

{
sendMessage(“Test Command WATCH OUT YOU GOT A PHAT”);
addItem(1048, 1);
}[/code]

You can edit this and add it with this:

Find “phats”

under the last “}”
add your command
